I will extract the SQL query string in the mainWorkflow and then pass it as a fixed string in params when calling the PostgreSQL action. This avoids the expression error. Also, I need to ensure the input_data contains the same query for validation.

Extract the cleaned SQL query in mainWorkflow and pass it in both input_data and params for action_1.
Test the PostgreSQL action execution with the fixed string query.
Verify the workflow runs without errors.
